title: Reserve Your Stay at Quinta Malaposta
description: We’ve reserved 16 rooms at our reception venue, Quinta Malaposta, for guests traveling from abroad or longer distances. You’re welcome to request a room for the night before or after the wedding. As rooms are limited, we cannot guarantee availability, but we will review your request and follow up with a confirmation.  If you prefer alternative accommodations, please see our recommended hotel options below.
